title: How to Sign Out of Netflix on a PS3

steps.headline: Plug in a PS3 gaming controller.
steps.description: You cannot easily use a PlayStation movie remote for this code. You can either use a controller that connects to a USB port or a wireless remote.

steps.headline: Click on the Netflix application.
steps.description: It is listed under video streaming in the Xross Media Bar (XMB). Scrolling through the XMB should test that your controller is properly connected.

steps.headline: Choose the main account holder in the list of profiles.
steps.description: Netflix Profiles allows users to use different lists for each viewer. This function may make it unnecessary to change Netflix accounts frequently.

steps.headline: Select the Instant Queue screen.
steps.description: This should automatically appear once you start Netflix on the PlayStation. If you have been using the search function or suggestion sections, you will need to return to the main Instant Queue section.

steps.headline: Scroll to the bottom of the Instant Queue.
Press the following sequence on your controller: Up, Up, Down, Down, Left, Right, Left, Right, Up, Up, Up, Up.
steps.description: This code is similar to the Konami Code used in video gaming. They are considered “cheat codes,” that enable a secret function in the game. The Netflix code is similar to the original Konami Code until the last 4 commands.

steps.headline: Wait for a dialog box to pop up.
steps.description: It should explain the account that is currently activated on your PS3. This is called the “debug menu.”

steps.headline: Choose the Deactivation link at the bottom of the box.

text: Hooking Up Your Controller Plug in a PS3 gaming controller. You cannot easily use a PlayStation movie remote for this code. You can either use a controller that connects to a USB port or a wireless remote. Start your PlayStation3.  Click on the Netflix application. It is listed under video streaming in the Xross Media Bar (XMB). Scrolling through the XMB should test that your controller is properly connected. Accessing Netflix Choose the main account holder in the list of profiles. Netflix Profiles allows users to use different lists for each viewer. This function may make it unnecessary to change Netflix accounts frequently. Select the Instant Queue screen. This should automatically appear once you start Netflix on the PlayStation. If you have been using the search function or suggestion sections, you will need to return to the main Instant Queue section. Scroll to the bottom of the Instant Queue.  Using the Secret Code Press the following sequence on your controller: Up, Up, Down, Down, Left, Right, Left, Right, Up, Up, Up, Up. This code is similar to the Konami Code used in video gaming. They are considered “cheat codes,” that enable a secret function in the game. The Netflix code is similar to the original Konami Code until the last 4 commands. Wait for a dialog box to pop up. It should explain the account that is currently activated on your PS3. This is called the “debug menu.” Choose the Deactivation link at the bottom of the box.
